document.topic_text: Comment Bollywood star Salman Khan's appointment as goodwill ambassador of India's contingent for the upcoming Rio Olympics drew mixed responses today (April 26) even as noted scriptwriter Salim Khan defended his son. Several sporting icons and legends have questioned the IOA's decission to appoint Salman Khan as the Goodwill Ambassador. Cricketer Virat Kohli has evaded to answer questions on Salman Khan's appointment. And, veteran actor & BJP MP Hema Malini has backed Salman Khan's appointment.
document.post: Comment Bollywood star Salman Khan's appointment as goodwill ambassador of India's contingent for the upcoming Rio Olympics drew mixed responses today (April 26) even as noted scriptwriter Salim Khan defended his son. Several sporting icons and legends have questioned the IOA's decission to appoint Salman Khan as the Goodwill Ambassador. Cricketer Virat Kohli has evaded to answer questions on Salman Khan's appointment. And, veteran actor & BJP MP Hema Malini has backed Salman Khan's appointment.
